tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I recently  Dr. Anshudeep after my routine blood checkup and was thoroughly impressed. His friendliness made me feel at ease right from the start. He demonstrated great expertise in his field, patiently explaining my issues in a clear and understandable manner. Dr. Anshudeep also provided a comprehensive treatment plan, ensuring I was informed about every step. I highly recommend him for his professionalism and excellent patient care.---

tags: None
review:
Extremely scientific approach 
Last year I contracted severe Covid post that I had partially lost my ability to smell, somebody suggested steam inhalation which i had been doing regularly for a year. Since then I started having an intermittent runny nose and severe irritation in the throat following that i increased steam inhalation even further. Doctor asked me to bring a steamer along on the follow-up visit, he dismantled it and showed me burnt and singed plastic on the heating element, he further said this could be the cause of my nose and throat problem, upon stopping the use all my symptoms resolved promptly, I was speechless. Now me and my wife  take the trouble of traveling for 2 hours just to visit him for my BP and diabetes treatment and Rheumatoid arthritis of my wife, But its worth the hassle.

tags: None
review: I was having a cellulitis on the elbow and since it was on nerve the pain was excruciating I was unable to move or fold my hand I visit a local doctor and he prescribed me some antibiotic and even after taking the complete dose it didn’t heal ******* *** **** **** ** ******* *********** hence one of my friend recommended me dr Anshudeep’s name and I met doctor immediately, he not only gave proper treatment and also he was so humble to explain me that the antibiotic ***** *** ***** ****** ********** **** *********** ************ ** ** **** *** ***** ** ****** **** *** he also enlightened me about the patient’s responsibility towards the correct use of antibiotics.

tags: None
review: Went to visit doctor for the second opinion on my chronic ailment I carry a big stack of several reports and prescriptions from previous consultations at other hospitals.He first interviewed and examined me in detail and discussed his impression then only went through the reports,he did not ask for any additional test.I found this approch very impressive and satisfying .Now after changing the treatment i have a good relief from symptoms,More importantly now i am feeling very hopeful about treatment...Thank you Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anshudeep stands out for his out-of-the-box thinking in healthcare. Once, when I had an unusual symptom, he thought beyond the usual diagnoses and discovered a rare condition that other doctors had missed. His ability to approach medical issues creatively sets him apart, making him an invaluable resource for anyone seeking a physician with exceptional problem-solving skills. Highly recommend Dr. Anshudeep for his unique and effective approach to healthcare.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had unusual symptoms so diagnosing my illness was getting difficult.My relatives referred me to Dr Anshudeep who promptly ordered few test and diagnosis was made,it was such a relief. He is very particular about rational use of medicine which he mentions frequently when he talks.now after few weeks I am symptom free now

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctors nature is very confidence inspiring,he listened to my problems patiently and prescribed appropriate treatment clinic staff also is very cooperative on my follow up visit they informed me before hand about possible delay that I think is a rare gesture in today's world

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor explained and wrote detailed instructions for my condition which really helped.So far I have visited his clinic twice for my self and my wife, Every time he asks us to inform about condition regularly till we feel better,to which he replies promptly,this i think is a very rare gesture these days.Extremly happy.

review:
My dry cough of  several years,after 15 days of treatment total symptom free now. Drugs were stopped after followup.Dr is very humble and extremely focused on examination than investigations.expect some waiting time for your appointment and keep some spare time at hand.
very good doctor and human being.My husband too is his happy patient

review: Saw him for second time regarding follow up.I was initially on multiple drugs for my diabetes and hypertension.Bp and sugar were not under good control plus cholesterol values were getting deranged.Doctor asked entire history asked me to make detailed diet,bp and sugar chart .based on that started treatment.Now 2 months later I don't have burning sensation in feet sugar and bp within control.waiting for hba1c report.My best wishes for dr Dodake.

tags: None
review: Dr Anshudeep is great with diagnosis and have a great clinical acumen, my association with dr is quite old. he is being serving our family since last 6 years as a family doctor and we are fortunate to have him there whenever we need him in any medical emergency.
reply_text: Thanks you for your Trust in me.

tags: None
review: Great experience as a first timer. I barely waited to be helped when I checked in. The staff and Dr. Anshudeep were all very friendly and helpful. I especially loved how Dr really took his time to explain my conditions with me as well as my treatment options. I had a great visit and the doctor’s demeanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommend this clinic.

He has a no non sense approach *** **** *** ***** *********** **********

Thanks doctor
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.
